ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
ack.p: This research was funded by the ERA‐Net BiodivERsA, with the national funders FWF (Austrian Science Fund, project “Who Is Next” I‐1443‐B25 to G.K., I.D., F.E., D.M., S.D.), DFG (German Research Foundation: O.B., E.H., M.vK.) and ANR (French National Research Agency: M.C., W.T.), part of the 2012‐2013 BiodivERsA call for research proposals. P.P. and J.P. were supported by projects 504/11/1028 and 14‐36079G Centre of Excellence PLADIAS (Czech Science Foundation), long‐term research development project RVO 67985939 and Praemium Academiae award (The Czech Academy of Sciences).
